fields.title: Hello World!
fields.author: Jonathan Lowe
fields.content:
Hello world!

I have decided to make a web comic, for my own personal enjoyment and so I would have a reason to learn about building websites.

I have posted some comics I drew a while ago and will add more eventually; I will be busy for the next few months.

This blog will be primarially used for posting updates and information about the comic.

Adios amigos!
